#summary Tools Overview

=Tools Overview=

|| LAS File Utilities || ||	
|| [LASFileInfo Get LAS File Info] || Displays header and projection information for an LAS file ||
|| [AddProject Add Projection to LAS File(s)] || Adds embedded projection information to LAS files ||
|| [ReprojectLAS Reproject LAS File(s)] || Converts existing LAS files into a new map projection ||
|| [AsciiToLAS Convert Ascii Data to LAS] || Converts text point data into LAS format lidar files ||
|| [LAStoAscii Convert LAS Data to Ascii] || Converts LAS format lidar files into delimited text point data ||
|| [BufferLAS Buffer LAS Files] || Geographically buffers the data using neighboring files ||
|| [TileLAS Tile LAS File(s)] || Divides one or more files into multiple tiles ||
|| [DecimateLAS Decimate LAS File(s)] || Decimates the points the data file ||
|| Subset LAS File(s) || ||
||   * [SubsetLASCoord Subset via Coordinates] || Subsets data files according to user coordinates ||
||   * [SubsetLASRoi Subset via Image/ROI] || Subsets data files using a reference image and/or regions of interest ||
|| [HeightFiltering Perform Height Filtering] || Performs vegetation filtering on the data ||
|| [RasterizeLAS Rasterize Lidar Data] || Converts raw point data into various raster products
|| [BoundaryLAS Create Boundary EVF/SHP/KML] || Creates an vector file (EVF, shape or KML) that shows the boundaries of the data ||
|| [ProfileLAS Create Elevation Profile(s)] || Creates one or more elevation profiles along a user-defined transect ||
|| [ExportLAS Export Ground Points Only (LAS)] || Exports ground points only (classification = 2) as a new LAS file ||
|| [3DViewer 3D Lidar Viewer] || An interactive viewer for displaying lidar point data ||
